review: a total paisa vasool movie... really don't know why the hell the audience reject it... it's a superb combination of action, drama, comedy and good music as well. the only reason for which i think the audience rejected it is due to bad dance moves of ad in aj... but, that was shown as comedy scenes in the movie... if the audience can accept ajay in his golmaal series, than this movie should also be worth accepting... bad luck for both ajay and prabhudeva... but, in my view, it's a must watch movie for them who want their full ticket money back in 3 hours...
